unnormalised: SpiceJet flight SG 402 from Delhi to Mumbai was delayed by 3 hrs today, now scheduled to depart at 18:30 hrs instead of the original 15:30 hrs, according to airport sources. Passengers are requested to check their boarding passes for updated gate information. Apparently, there’s some tech snag they’re trying to sort out.
normalised: SpiceJet flight S-G four hundred and two from Delhi to Mumbai was delayed by three hours today, now scheduled to depart at eighteen thirty hours instead of the original fifteen thirty hours, according to airport sources. Passengers are requested to check their boarding passes for updated gate information. Apparently, there’s some tech snag they’re trying to sort out.

unnormalised: The Mumbai local train schedule on the central line is also experiencing minor disruptions. Trains running 10-15 mins late due to signal issues near Thane as of 11:00 AM. Commuters are advised to plan their travel accordingly, especially if catching a connecting flight or train. Guess reaching office on time is gonna be tough!
normalised: The Mumbai local train schedule on the central line is also experiencing minor disruptions. Trains running ten to fifteen minutes late due to signal issues near Thane as of eleven zero zero A-M. Commuters are advised to plan their travel accordingly, especially if catching a connecting flight or train. Guess reaching office on time is gonna be tough!

unnormalised: Meanwhile, the Maharashtra State Road Transport Corporation (MSRTC) bus service from Pune to Nashik is running as per schedule, with buses departing every 2 hrs starting from 06:00 hrs. Bookings can be made online or at the bus depot. Diwali rush is expected next week, so book ASAP!
normalised: Meanwhile, the Maharashtra State Road Transport Corporation (M-S-R-T-C) bus service from Pune to Nashik is running as per schedule, with buses departing every two hours starting from zero six zero zero hours. Bookings can be made online or at the bus depot. Diwali rush is expected next week, so book A-S-A-P!
